PageInfo.Message:
<COL 78f5ff>Pawn Tactical Training has been
released!</COL>
By ringing the<COL ffdc78>"Chatting Bell"</COL>in
your room, you can cultivate your main pawn's
behavior through dialogue.
The behavior can be cultivated for each job of
each main pawn.

To have a conversation with the Main Pawn, it is
necessary to have a <COL ffdc78>《Dialogue
Count》</COL> of 1 or more.
By defeating enemies together with the Main Pawn,
you can obtain <COL ffdc78>《Training EXP》</COL>.
Every time you obtain a certain amount of
Training EXP, the Dialogue Count will increase.

Training EXP will be granted as a bonus based on
the amount obtained in a day.
※ The earlier the training, the more bonuses will
be granted.
The training EXP counted as the amount obtained
in a day <COL ffdc78>will be reset at 5 am every
morning.</COL>

As you continue to raise them, the number of
topics you can have dialogues about and the
maximum number of dialogue counts you can stock
will increase.
In addition, Partner Pawns will slightly increase
their growth speed.
To ensure that your pawn can support your battles
accurately, let's have repeated dialogues.
